TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InheritanceMappingAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class InheritanceMappingAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class InheritanceMappingAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 映射 LINQ to SQL 应用程序中的继承层次结构。

span.span: Maps an inheritance hierarchy in a LINQ to SQL application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个映射的类指定一个。One is specified per mapped class. 映射继承层次结构时, 请注意以下事项:Note the following when you map inheritance hierarchies: - 层次结构中的所有类都必须映射到单个表。All classes in a hierarchy must be mapped to a single table. - 必须在位于层次结构顶部的映射类型上声明继承层次结构的表。The table for an inheritance hierarchy must be declared on the mapped type that is at the top of the hierarchy. 不能在派生自顶级类的类中指定表或映射属性。You cannot specify the table or mapping attributes in a class that is derived from the top class. - 你可以使用层次结构中的接口, 但[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]不会映射它。You can use an interface in a hierarchy, but [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] does not map it. - 您可以在映射类时跳过层次结构中的某个类, 但只能对映射的类进行查询。You can skip a class in the hierarchy when you map classes, but you can query against mapped classes only. 对于正确的具体化, 鉴别器代码值必须是唯一的并且与数据库中的值相匹配。For correct materialization, discriminator code values must be unique and match the values in the database. 如果行的鉴别器代码值不完全匹配 (即使是大小写), 则使用设置为来`true`实例化类。A row with a discriminator code value that does not exactly match (even by casing) instantiates the class by using set to `true`. ## Examples 此示例显示层次结构的继承映射, 其中, top、映射类`Shape`() 是抽象的。This example shows inheritance mapping for a hierarchy where the top, mapped class (`Shape`) is abstract. [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute/vb/Module1.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何包含未映射的类。The following example shows the inclusion of unmapped classes. 可以在层次结构中的任何位置放置未映射的类。You can put unmapped classes anywhere in the hierarchy. [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute/cs/Program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute/vb/Module1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当鉴别器值与指定值不匹配时是否实例化此类型的对象。

span.span: Gets or sets whether an object of this type in instantiated when the discriminator value does not match a specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能用 as声明其中一个特性。`true`Exactly one of the attributes must be declared with as `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置层次结构中类的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of the class in the hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用继承层次结构中的任何非抽象类型, 包括根类型。Use any non-abstract type in the inheritance hierarchy, including the root type.
